meta.notes: Weeks roll every 7 days (6 seeds Ã— 7 = 42). Customize by day later as needed.

weeks.cue: Speak the thing â€” one brave, kind outbound note.
Sweeten one interaction â€” add warmth, play, or thanks.
Show your work â€” share one small draft with someone.
Orient â€” step outside, look up; pick a star as your north.
Move for one song â€” let the body lead the mind.
Draw a boundary â€” say no to one nonâ€‘essential thing.
